files.help:
**Disclaimer: supported, but may be created by other programs.**

XDG is supported out-of-the-box, so we can simply move the file to _"$XDG_DATA_HOME"/pki_.

Some apps (chromium, for example) hardcode path to _"$HOME"/.pki_, so the folder may appear again, see [](https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=818686#c11).
